metadata.Title: CVE-2020-13999 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
ScaleViewPortExtEx in libemf.cpp in libEMF (aka ECMA-234 Metafile Library) 1.0.12 allows an integer overflow and denial of service via a crafted EMF file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-13999` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libemf1 - 1.0.13-2
printemf - 1.0.13-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libemf package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.13-2').
